item.description:
**We'll meet tonight at 7:15pm!! **

We will be starting Chapter 1 of "The Artist's Way" and Chapter 1 of "Walking in This World" (the next in Cameron's three-book creativity series). It's a "spiral path," so whether you're just starting with the first book, or moving on to the next, there will be common themes to address. Please come prepared to discuss one or both of the chapters!!

Please bring a $5 donation to the Gallery for the use of their space -- thank you!!
item.how_to_find_us: I will greet you at the door
item.name: "The Artist's Way" and "Walking in This World" 12 week Cambridge Meetup
